The Environment¶

class environment.Building¶

This class represents the building that has to be controlled. Its dynamics are modelled based on an RC analogy. When instanciated, it initialises the inside temperature to 21°C, the envelope temperature to 20, and resets the done and time variables.

heat_pump_power(phi_e)¶

Takes an electrical power flow and converts it to a heat flow.

Parameters

phi_e (Float) – The electrical power

Returns

Returns the heat flow as an integer

reset()¶

This method is resetting the attributes of the building.

Returns

Returns the resetted inside temperature

reward(action)¶

Returns the received value for the chosen action and transition to next state

Parameters

action – The selected action

Returns

Returns the reward for that action

step(action)¶
Parameters

action (Integer) – The chosen action - is the index of selected action from the action space.

Returns

Returns the new state after a step, the reward for the action and the done state
